MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column containing the table cell or item.

value.span: Un número ordinal de base cero que representa la columna que contiene el elemento o celda de tabla.

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number representing the column containing the table cell or item.

remarks.format: ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente, un agente de escucha se declara para realizar el seguimiento de la exploración transversal de los elementos de la tabla dentro de un contenedor de la tabla.In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of table items within a table container. Propiedades de los elementos se registran tras cada evento de cambio de foco.Item properties are recorded upon each focus changed event. span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern control pattern and represents the table cell or item container.
